This is a very good Courtyard good pool and facilities with good helpful staff who go out of their way to help
There is a garden near the shore with many and nice chairs available
The concierges Liane and Dana were the BEST
Nice view but food quality is less than expected
Beautiful location close to just about everything
The hotel is close to the airport and the central location makes it a great base to explore the rest of the island
Nice location and great hotel experience
